body.name: LED Desk Lamp Table Lamp Dimmable Reading Lamp with USB Charging Port 5 Lighting Modes 5 Brightness Levels, Sensitive Control, 30/60 min Auto Timer, Eye-Caring Office Lamp (Black 1.0)

features: Vision - Caring Technology -- -- LED desk lamp creates no flicker, no dizzy light, no shadow and soft light, which avoids eye fatigue caused by flickering light and harsh glare effectively, desk lamp is ideal for reading, study for long time
25 Adjustable Light Choices -- -- This desk light has 5 brightness levels and 5 lighting modes to choose,providing ideal light levels for working, studying, reading, and relaxing
Flexible Lamp Arm -- -- With 225°flexible arm and 90°base axis, the led lamp can be adjusted to any your preferred angle. You can choose the best lighting angle to accommodate different requirements.

Easy Touch Control&Memory function -- -- Touch Sensor Switch is applied to this table lamp for you easy control. Memory function means you only need to set the brightness / color mode once and the desk lamp will automatically return to the setting when turned on next time

Long Lifespan & years Warranty-- -This led desk lamp No Lead or Mercury. No UV or IR Radiation. Adopting aluminum alloy heat sink, Up to 50000hrs Lifespan, 40 times longer than a typical incandescent light. Table lamps enjoy 12-month warranty and 100% customer satisfaction guarantee
body.description: Eye-caring desk Lamps Prosperous desk lamp provides a Gentle, natural light to protect your eyes New improved version LED desk lamp, more solid materials, 52 full-spectrum lamp beads, desk lamp's light more gentle, more uniform lighting，Designed for reading, studying, and working .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product more than we expected!!
reviews.reviewText: It was a great purchase. The light is in so many ways changeable, from mild to bright by touching with a finger. It included a timer and a USB charger for the phone. There was no instruction in the delivered box, but I went to back the Amazon sight and figured it out. I bought a similar light from a different seller and paid more money before this one. This light is less costly but more valuable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome lamp for nightstand or desk. Great quality!
reviews.reviewText: Very bright and reliable. Love the fact that you can change light tones and dimming feature is absolutely great! Loved the first one I bought so much I purchased another. You can’t go wrong with this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do This if You Have Problems Staying On
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good light. I use it as a backlight in my office and for Zoom. Sturdier than another I bought. The arm articulates backwards past the vertical a bit, maybe to about 100-110 degrees of a circle or so.About three months in it started not staying on all the time. This got worse, until I had issues turning it on and then figured out it's the cheap USB cord they provide. Since these are a dime a dozen for nice ones on Amazon, it was an easy fit to grab one out of my drawer and now I've had no issues.I'd recommend this light. The footprint is a little big...about 7x4 inches but that's what makes it sturdy and it's just heavy enough not to get knocked around.I wish the light was a little brighter, but it's bright enough to most applications and I wouldn't consider it dim at all. It's just when I use it I usually have it up to the max.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of this lamp. It’s very sleek and minimal, but tall enough so you can reach around it so get other things on the nightstand. The brightness is also on par for what it’s made for- a reading or desk lamp. It lights up the small area around the lamp, which is what was expected. You can even swivel the bottom toward you to face your book. If you swivel up the top part all the way up, the lamp is out of the way. I like the options for light hues, based on needs. I also love how you can do the smallest light level and fold up the lamp to use as a night light with barely any brightness. It also has a timer which is nice if you want to have it turn off at night automatically. One of my favorite things is the usb charging port so I can charge my phone without having to use an outlet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent Space-Efficient Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp because I was looking for a space-saving lamp for my cramped desk.Overall, I am pleased with the lamp. It came well-packaged and was easy to install. The light and dimming options are nice and very easy to use. Best of all, it hardly takes up any space. I like that it can twist and turn to the angle I need, and then I can fold it up when I don’t need it to further save space. I have not tested the sleep mode.Drawbacks:The biggest issue for me is that the lamp doesn’t save your previous lighting setting when you turn it on again. It defaults to a blindingly bright white light instead of the eye-saving, orangey, dim light I prefer it set at. Another issue is that the package included a usb cable, but not a wall plug-in. While this was not an issue for me, I could see this being an issue for others. The last issue is that the dimming options on the stand are faded and missing in one spot (see second pic).Overall, I would recommend this lamp. It accomplishes what I needed and the pros heavily outweigh the cons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: PROS:-Inexpensive. Feels high quality and has good features for <$25. Well balanced and doesn't tip over.-Easy to use controls. Touch controls are responsive and easy to use. Can slide your finger along the brightness control to adjust the brightness, or you can just tap the level you want.-Lighting modes: Easy to toggle between the 5 lighting color options-Can plug a USB charging cable into the back to charge a device-Easy to adjust the position of the armsCONS:It comes with a USB power cable but no plug. You'll need to plug it into a computer or a spare USB power supply, like a wall phone charger plug. It wasn't clear in the product description that a plug wasn't included. The lamp itself is great - just make sure you have a plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, versatile lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a sleek desk lamp that would not take up too much space while providing adequate lighting for reading, writing, and art. I like the variation in light colors and brightness - there are some times I prefer warm light and other tasks for which I prefer a cool white. I am able to adjust the angle and position of the lamp without moving the base, and I find the aesthetic of the lamp to be minimalist and pleasing. This lamp is perfect for the purposes for which I needed it.If I run into any problems or find any cons going forward, I will update this review accordingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Charging cord won't stay in
reviews.reviewText: The USB charging port is incompatible with a normal usb cord, it fits but it won't stay without a ton of tape. It is also prone to turning off, flickering, and other things that make one paranoid that a device might start a fire. It was so useless I ended up trashing it. I am looking for a similar light that actually works, even if it us slightly mote expensive. It's not worth the savings.
